law.catch_line: Specific powers and duties of Director—Issuance of regulations; testing at County-supported institutions.

text.section:
Sec. 8A-82. Specific powers and duties of Director—Issuance of regulations; testing at County-supported institutions.
Regulations. The Director shall issue from time to time reasonable regulations for the enforcement of this article, which regulations shall have the force and effect of law.
Testing at County-supported institutions. The Director shall from time to time test all weights and measures used in checking the receipt and disbursement of supplies in every institution for the maintenance of which monies are appropriated by the County Commission, reporting his findings in writing, to the executive officer of the institution concerned.
